Install Tina4

Follow the steps below to get Tina4 on your system. Soon you will be able to bring your ideas to life.

Make sure you have the prerequisites installed (guides:install:php, guides:install:composer, guides:install:openssl & ide tool).

  • Windows
  • Mac
  • Linux

It can sometimes be frustrating to wait for the release. Install the bleeding edge 


  composer require tina4stack/tina4php:dev-master
